summary: The script provides utilities to transform original AudioLDM2 model checkpoints into the Diffusers library format. It extracts and adapts components such as the VAE, UNet, projection layers, CLAP encoder, and HiFi-GAN vocoder, generates corresponding configuration files, and assembles a ready‑to‑use AudioLDM2 pipeline with appropriate schedulers.
business_intent: Facilitate the migration of pretrained AudioLDM2 models to a standardized, easy‑to‑deploy Diffusers pipeline, allowing developers and researchers to integrate advanced audio generation capabilities into their applications without handling low‑level checkpoint details.
